channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins OpsGenie Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins OpsGenie Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34804|2024-08-03T09:22:09.859Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20opsgenie%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpsGenie Plugin 1.9 and earlier transmits API keys in plain text as part of the global Jenkins configuration form and job configuration forms, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2022-34803|2024-08-03T09:22:09.917Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20opsgenie%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpsGenie Plugin 1.9 and earlier stores API keys unencrypted in its global configuration file and in job config.xml files on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission (config.xml), or access to the Jenkins controller file system.
